etymology.description: 淮海 (Huai River + coastal/sea region) + 战役/戰役 (military campaign) = the campaign fought in the Huaihai region.
etymology.interpretation: Names a major 1948–49 campaign of the Chinese Civil War centered around the Huaihai region (e.g., Xuzhou area). Combines a toponym with the military term for a large-scale operation.
etymology.simplification: 戰 → 战 reduces strokes by streamlining components; 淮 and 海 unchanged; 役 unchanged.

parts.english: Huai (river name);Huai River region;area around the Huai;surname

examples.chinese: 淮海战役是解放战争三大战役之一(淮海戰役是解放戰爭三大戰役之一)。
examples.pinyin: Huáihǎi Zhànyì shì Jiěfàng Zhànzhēng sān dà zhànyì zhī yī.
examples.english: The Huaihai Campaign was one of the three major campaigns of the War of Liberation.

examples.chinese: 战役主要在徐州地区进行，最终以人民解放军胜利告终(戰役主要在徐州地區進行，最終以人民解放軍勝利告終)。
examples.pinyin: Zhànyì zhǔyào zài Xúzhōu dìqū jìnxíng, zuìzhōng yǐ Rénmín Jiěfàngjūn shènglì gàozhōng.
examples.english: The campaign was fought mainly in the Xuzhou area and ended in a PLA victory.

examples.chinese: 学者通过研究淮海战役，总结出大兵团作战的组织与补给经验(學者通過研究淮海戰役，總結出大兵團作戰的組織與補給經驗)。
examples.pinyin: Xuézhě tōngguò yánjiū Huáihǎi Zhànyì, zǒngjié chū dà bīngtuán zuòzhàn de zǔzhī yǔ bǔjǐ jīngyàn.
examples.english: Scholars study the Huaihai Campaign to summarize organizational and logistics lessons for large-unit operations.
